description:
This modern studio is very well located in a building recently renovated. 
It is located in one of the best area of New York City, in the center of Manhattan. Only a few blocks to the Flatiron building, the Empire State Building, Madison Square Garden/Penn Station and Time Square!
The studio is very nice with a kitchenette (fridge, sink, microwave, electric cooktop) and a private modern bathroom.
There is also a dining table for 4 and a flat screen tv with cable.
It is on the 4th floor. No elev.

The studio is located in the neighborhood of Cheslea, only 5 blocks from the MAdison Square Garden and Penn Station.

The subway is a block away
name: Modern Studio in the center of Manhattan!
review: Central location perfect for visiting the city or a short business trip
